channel.title: Static Site Generators on htr3n's
channel.description: Recent content in Static Site Generators on htr3n's

item.title: First Experience with Hugo
item.description: To commence my journey in software development, I have looked for a Web framework to build my personal blog. As I have started writing blog posts mainly using Markdown and plan to migrate other posts to Markdown too, it’s naturally obvious to go with built-in or first-class support for Markdown to minimize the migration effort. Thus far I did not foresee any great use of extensive backend storage and computation. Thus I narrowed down my search to static site generators with two prominent candidates Jekyll and Hugo popping up, for instance, here, here, and here.
